intent_atoms.description: Implement SwiftFormat enforcement in pre-push hook and CI workflow to maintain consistent code style across the project.
SwiftFormat must be enforced before any push is allowed.
All commits must pass SwiftFormat checks; failing commits are rejected by pre-push hook and CI.
Reinstate SwiftLint complexity thresholds in the codebase to enforce coding standards.
SwiftLint complexity thresholds are re-enabled and validated against existing code.
Gate test coverage using coverage_analysis.py to ensure minimum coverage levels.
Test coverage must meet the defined threshold; otherwise CI fails.
Add Swift duplication detection to CI using jscpd in a new workflow file swift-duplication.yml.
Fix shellcheck style warnings in GitHub Actions workflows by removing suppression flags and re-enabling full validation.
All GitHub Actions workflows pass actionlint and shellcheck without suppressed warnings.
Implement interactive SwiftUI components (buttons, sliders, toggles) as part of Foundation UI Phase 2.
Migrate manual .accentColor usage to Foundation UI design tokens DS.Color.*.
The application uses only DS.Color* tokens for color and opacity values.
Move ParseIssueStore from GCD queues to @MainActor or custom actor isolation.
